rubrics.rubric: Knee pain < beginning to walk, > continued motion
rubrics.modality: Pain < first motion, > after walking a while

rubrics.rubric: Joint stiffness after rest, better by gentle motion
rubrics.modality: Morning stiffness or < after sitting long
rubrics.notes: Inflammatory stiffness typical in OA and overuse

rubrics.rubric: Painful, enlarged knee joint with creaking on motion
rubrics.modality: Grating or popping sound in joint; deforming OA
rubrics.notes: Indicates cartilage loss and bony change

rubrics.rubric: Hip pain with stiffness and limping gait
rubrics.modality: Pain < rising from seat or stairs
rubrics.notes: OA of hip joint with weight-bearing pain

rubrics.rubric: OA pain worse in cold damp weather, better warmth
rubrics.modality: < rainy season, < cold wind, > heat pads

rubrics.rubric: Finger joint nodules, swelling, deformity (Heberden’s nodes)
rubrics.modality: Hard swellings in DIP joints, stiffness, deformity
rubrics.notes: OA of small joints with bone overgrowth

rubrics.rubric: Back pain due to OA in lumbar or cervical spine
rubrics.modality: Pain < movement, < damp; stiffness, restricted rotation
rubrics.notes: Spondylotic degeneration linked to OA pathology

rubrics.rubric: Joint pain < climbing stairs or squatting
rubrics.notes: OA in knee or hip typically presents like this

rubrics.rubric: Cracking joints, painless or slightly stiff
rubrics.modality: No pain but lots of cracking sounds
rubrics.notes: Precursor or early OA state with crepitus

rubrics.rubric: Chronic OA with hereditary tendency, obesity, metabolic origin
rubrics.modality: Slow onset, early stiffness, weight-bearing pain
rubrics.notes: Constitutional miasm with fat, sluggish metabolism, uric acid link

rubrics.rubric: Joint degeneration after suppression (skin, urine, steroids)
rubrics.modality: OA follows eczema suppression or anti-inflammatory overuse
rubrics.notes: Important in deep chronic OA or mixed cases

rubrics.rubric: OA with marked bony outgrowths, deformity, or ankylosis
rubrics.modality: Joints enlarged, fixed, or fused; late-stage destructive arthritis
rubrics.notes: Bone-remedy intercurrents for severe joint pathology

rubrics.rubric: OA linked to grief, emotional shock, long-standing stress
rubrics.modality: Pain started or worsened after a personal trauma or insult
rubrics.notes: Mind-body layer key to unlock frozen chronicity

rubrics.rubric: Chronic OA with joint complaints alternating with skin or gut issues
rubrics.modality: When joint pain lessens, eruptions or bloating appears

rubrics.rubric: OA with recurrent flares despite well-selected remedies
rubrics.modality: Case relapses or moves to new joints over months
rubrics.notes: Requires intercurrent remedy to clear miasmatic block
